title: Sorry Riot, but I have to agree.
body:
Taliyah kit changes during 8.11 where a complete failure. I was about to pick her up, but she is now unplayable, and I mean unplayable.

I would love to get old Taliyah back when she was a stable champion. Then keep an eye out for the person who suggested the changed, and take his words with a grain of salt. He clearly, messed her up more than fixed her. 

There are already posts explaining the concern in better detail, I just want to confirm that I am onboard with reverting Taliyah's 8.11 changes.

You can agree or disagree. Let me know what you think.
